question: Which two countries were involved in the "Hanish Islands Conflict"?
explanation: Yemen and Eritrea were involved in the "Hanish Islands Conflicts of 1995". It was a dispute over the control of Greater Hansih Islands in the Zaqar-Hanish Archipelago between Eritrea and Yemen. In 1998, the Permanent Court of Arbitration settled the dispute favouring Yemen's control of Archipelago.
